segments.text: I keep looking at that little boy on the stool, and honestly, it makes me incredibly nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks so flimsy, with its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really high up, stretching his body towards that cookie jar in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It appears to be tilting backwards, just on the verge of toppling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His focus is entirely on those cookies, not on his unstable footing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below him doesn't seem to notice the danger either, just her impending treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just know that stool is going to tip, and he's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a miracle it hasn't happened yet with how much he's moving.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart actually skips a beat watching him reach for another cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I sincerely hope he manages to get down safely, or that someone intervenes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a precarious situation for a child.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the crash and the cries already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It truly is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
